description: Deterministic decision evaluation policy for compliance, audit, legal, and governance decisions

decision_rules.description: decision_requested field must be present in payload
decision_rules.fail_message: Required field 'decision_requested' is missing from payload

decision_rules.description: justification field must be present in payload
decision_rules.fail_message: Required field 'justification' is missing from payload

decision_rules.description: justification must be a non-empty string
decision_rules.fail_message: Field 'justification' must be a non-empty string

decision_rules.description: Record the requested decision with justification
decision_rules.check: always passes if prior rules pass

notes: This policy records decisions with mandatory justification. The decision_requested field explicitly states the intended outcome, and justification provides the audit trail. All decisions are final and immutable once recorded.
